alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Red Lodge Foothills (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 23 at 1:10AM MST until November 24 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations between 4 and 9 inches. * WHERE...Beartooth Foothills and Red Lodge Foothills. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Untreated roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Rural travel could be impossible at times due to accumulations of heavy wet snow. Travel could be very difficult on US-212. Recreation in the high country will be impacted by heavy accumulating snow.
info.instruction: Persons should consider delaying all travel. Motorists should use extreme caution if travel is absolutely necessary. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
